overview: The true story of Gani Lasa, Deputy BP Batam. He is a coastal child of Nongsa who lives in poverty. His mother is a cake seller. After graduating from elementary school, he had to row a canoe to Tanjung Pinang from 17.00 to 06.00. to continue their education at PGA (Religious Teacher Education). That was the first time he wore shoes. Then he migrated to Yogyakarta to become a scholar.
title: Mimpi Anak Pulau
